node.statement: Step 1.4.5 (Physical interpretation): The q-deformation parameter interpolates between two gravitational regimes: (a) q=1 (k -> infinity): corrections controlled by 3D Euclidean gravity (Ponzano-Regge, infinite Chern-Simons level), and (b) q = root of unity (finite k): corrections controlled by 3D topological gravity (Turaev-Viro/Chern-Simons at finite level). The melonic dominance at large j persists in both regimes, providing a disorder-free quantum mechanical model with a tunable gravitational dual.
